Package org.apache.lucene.backward_codecs.store

Class EndiannessReverserUtil

java.lang.Object
org.apache.lucene.backward_codecs.store.EndiannessReverserUtil
public final class EndiannessReverserUtil extends Object
Utility class to wrap open files
NOTE: This API is for internal purposes only and might change in incompatible ways in the next release.
